an5.249:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks to a charnel ground.
an5.249:1.3: It’s filthy, stinking, frightening, a gathering place for savage monsters, and a weeping place for many people.
an5.249:1.4: These are the five drawbacks of a charnel ground.
an5.249:2.1: In the same way there are five drawbacks of a person like a charnel ground.
an5.249:2.3: To start with, some person has filthy conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an5.249:2.6: This is how they’re filthy, I say.
an5.249:2.7: That person is just as filthy as a charnel ground.
an5.249:3.1: Because of their filthy conduct, they get a bad reputation.
an5.249:3.2: This is how they’re stinky, I say.
an5.249:3.3: That person is just as stinky as a charnel ground.
an5.249:4.1: Because of their filthy conduct, good-hearted spiritual companions avoid them from afar.
an5.249:4.2: That’s how they’re frightening, I say.
an5.249:4.3: That person is just as frightening as a charnel ground.
an5.249:5.1: Because of their filthy conduct, they live together with people of a similar character.
an5.249:5.2: This is how they gather with savage monsters, I say.
an5.249:5.3: That person is just as much a gathering place of savage monsters as a charnel ground.
an5.249:6.1: Because of their filthy conduct, when good-hearted spiritual companions see them they complain:
an5.249:6.2: ‘Oh, it’s so painful for us to have to live together with such as these.’
an5.249:6.3: This is how there’s weeping, I say.
an5.249:6.4: This person is just as much a weeping place for many people as a charnel ground.
an5.249:6.6: These are the five drawbacks of a person like a charnel ground.”
